document.heading: District of Columbia Statehood Delegation Fund Commission Establishment and Tax Check-Off Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-226, the “District of Columbia Statehood Delegation Fund Commission Establishment and Tax Check-Off Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-575, which was referred to the Committee on Public Interest. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 13, 2004, and October 5, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 1, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-565 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-226 became effective on March 16, 2005.
